page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT SURVEY
page.content: People in the rural districts are either retired or are estate/farm workers,In the modern housing estate we found the following occupations. MALES FEMALES Architect Teacher Sales Rep. Restaurant Manageress Toll keeper cleaner Gardener Sales assistant Football Coach Cook Postal Executive Ashdown worker Hydrolic-asst.man. Bank assistant Audio-visual Tech. Nurse Insurance supervisor. Secretary Taxi driver Opticion Test Engineer Lab.Technician Shop assistant Barmaid Bus driver Housewife Bus mechanic Lollypop lady Uniroyal Secretary Law Courts Electrical engineer Accountant
